organizingThisCourse: I am organizing this course for another teacher
displayLanguageOption: Display language translation option for participants *
registrationMandatory: Registration is mandatory for this course
publicSentence: There are a lot of things you can do in space, and space essentially is unlimited resources.
privateSentence: There are a lot of things you can do in space, and space essentially is unlimited resources.
registrationsRestriction: Is geo restriction applicable for registrations
registrationsRestrictionDescription: Text entered in the 'Email Notes' field will be included in the registration confirmation email only irrespective of the transaction status (Email notes will not be shown on the Art of Living Website)
countryRegistrationsAllowed: Country(s) from where registrations are allowed
courseDescriptionText: Course Description text is managed by National Admin. If the National Admin has allowed Organizers / Teachers to edit Course description then only this field will be editable. If you want to change the course description and this field is not editable kindly contact your National Admin.
courseNotesText: Text entered in the 'Course Notes' field will be shown only on the Art of Living Website course details page.
